title: Bakuman, Volume 18: Margins and Hell
description: Average student Moritaka Mashiro enjoys drawing for fun. When his classmate and aspiring writer Akito Takagi discovers his talent, he begs Moritaka to team up with him as a manga-creating duo. But what exactly does it take to make it in the manga-publishing world? Reads R to L (Japanese Style) for teen audiences.
author: Tsugumi Ohba
